EmailTemplate.subject: New Containers and Pivotal Cloud Foundry White Paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We invite you to download a free copy of our new white paper: Containers and Pivotal Cloud Foundry.<[[https://pivotal.io/containers-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=wp-Containers-PCF_Q416]]> Containers have become popular with developers and operators alike because they offer a convenient way to achieve benefits that were hard to obtain otherwise, including:
- Consistency of deployment - Consistency of execution - Easing the Developer-to-Operator handoff
However, container technology—like Docker—is only one piece of a larger set of responsibilities needed for an enterprise platform.
In this white paper, we’ll take a high-level look at container technology and how containers are leveraged by Pivotal Cloud Foundry. We’ll describe how Pivotal Cloud Foundry takes a structured, opinionated view of application deployment and management to drive business value.
Download the free report today <[[https://pivotal.io/containers-and-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=wp-Containers-PCF_Q416]]>
Thanks,
The Pivotal Team
